message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $15,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is closer to its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my previous offer. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to go above $10,000. Could we possibly meet somewhere in between these two prices?
